hero.mainDescription: TurnX your stories into a beautiful hardcover book to preserve memories and connect with family or gift this unparalleled experience to your mom, dad or grandparent

step1.title: Answer questions weekly
step1.description: Or as often as you like

step2.title: Turn answers into a chapter with a click

perfectSection.title: Perfect for when you want to

content1.title: Give a truly meaningful gift
content1.subTitle: For mother’s day, dad’s birthday, grandparents anniversary or just as a random heartfelt gesture and a chance to learn about them. The result is not only a book but an unparalleled experience to be cherished for years to come.

content2.title: Share your Story and Wisdom
content2.subTitle: From your earliest memories to the lessons of adulthood, every story you share matters. Let your triumphs and trials inspire and guide the generations after you.

content3.title: Connect with your Family
content3.subTitle: Uncover the stories of those who hold a special place in your heart, revealing hidden treasures about your family and forging deeper connections through stories that bring you closer together.

content4.title: Reflect on your journey
content4.subTitle: Documenting personal challenges, triumphs, and growth serves as a therapeutic journey, encouraging self-reflection and possibly igniting resilience and appreciation within you and your family.

content5.cardText: Surprise your loved one with LifeScript and let them transform their memories into a keepsake book.

story1.heading: Easy and Time-saving
story1.content: Tell your story by simply answering thought-provoking questions and have fun while you reflect along the way. Save valuable time and avoid the hassle of years of writing, extensive interviews, and proofreading for typos.
story1.alt: A picture of a happy grandma holding her granddaughter who is kissing her on the cheek in the forest - LifeScript
story1.title: Happy grandma with granddaughter

story2.heading: Supported
story2.content: Enjoy a stress-free experience with our support through live chat, video tutorials, FAQs, and more. Our dedicated team is here to guide you at every step of your storytelling journey, ensuring you have the resources and assistance needed to effortlessly bring your story to life.
story2.alt: A close-up photo of the hands of a grandpa who is writing his memoir book by hand - LifeScript
story2.title: Grandpa writing his memoir

story3.heading: Flexible
story3.content: Your story is unique, and so is the way you tell it. If you don't feel like writing, feel free to speak your mind! Choose your own pace down memory lane on any device, anytime, anywhere.
story3.alt: A photo of an old lady who is recording her memories over the phone - LifeScript
story3.title: Grandma recording memories over the phone

story4.heading: Connected
story4.content: Safeguard your legacy with our Family Tree feature, capturing your lineage from parents and great-grandparents to distant ancestors by visualizing them at the end of your book.
story4.alt: Three generation family together in a circle smiling at the camera - LifeScript
story4.title: Three generation family smiling at the camera

reviewSection.Description: I created my life story with LifeScript and it was so easy and rewarding. Adding pictures and talking directly into the computer made everything simple. My stories turned into a beautiful book and my family loves it! It feels great to share my memories with them. The customer service was really helpful too. I recommend it to anyone wanting to leave something special for their family.
reviewSection.author: Emma Collins - Retired Teacher

accordion1.heading: 1. Narrative Fusion
accordion1.description: Turns your answers into beautifully written chapters with a single click. No writing experience needed.

accordion2.heading: 2. Assisted Editing
accordion2.description: Automatically edits and proofreads your text with real-time suggestions. No typos anymore.

accordion3.heading: 3. Voice-to-Text
accordion3.description: Captures your spoken words, transforming them into written text if you don’t feel like typing.

accordion4.heading: 4. Family Tree
accordion4.description: Visually represents your ancestry from parents to distant ancestors at the end of your book.

accordion5.heading: 5. Formatting Features
accordion5.description: Allows you to customize your text and its font, style, size, color, layout and more.

accordion6.heading: 6. Auto Photo Improvement
accordion6.description: Automatically adjusts your photos for high-quality printing by managing size, resolution, and more.

pricingSection.title: Our Pricing
pricingSection.subTitle: Plans
pricingSection.description: Each plan includes a one-time payment for lifetime access, a premium full-color hardcover book, and

testimonial1.name: Arthur Thompson,
testimonial1.details: Compiling my life stories in chronological order offered me a unique perspective on my journey. The insightful questions and the option to add my own made the experience very personal. It’s been a fascinating trip down memory lane and most importantly made me re-connect with my daughters on topics never discussed before.

testimonial2.name: Eleanor Rodriguez,
testimonial2.details: It took me about 4 months to complete this wonderful gift from my granddaughter. I'm 84 years old and I relived my life during this project. I decided not to share with my extended family about this until I gifted each of them a book. They have now also received a copy and their reactions are heartwarming!

testimonial3.name: Margaret Campbell,
testimonial3.details: Received LifeScript as a gift from my grandkids. Delving into my past, sharing stories, and connecting dots I hadn't in years was enlightening. As I'm 86, I hope this book lets future generations say, 'Wow, I wish I'd known her!' It's a bridge to me for them, and that's priceless.

testimonial4.name: George Watkins,
testimonial4.details: Reflecting on my life was a humbling experience. I never imagined I had a story worth sharing. Family means the world to me, and with so much of our family history fading away, my story together with the family tree could serve as information for my grandkids and their kids.

testimonial5.name: Linda Morris,
testimonial5.details: Starting this project, I really didn't know much about writing but the how-to videos made everything so much simpler. Anytime I got stuck, the support team helped me out with so much patience and kindness. They really helped me through it. The book turned out great and feels high quality. I've even told my sister to try it!

testimonial6.name: Derek Lee,
testimonial6.details: This was a really interesting experience. I liked that my normal answers were transformed into professional written text. I don’t have writing experience so narrative fusion and the auto grammar check really helped me get this done. Overall, I enjoyed the experience

testimonial7.name: Samantha Jones,
testimonial7.details: I loved picking out the font size and style for my book – it made it feel so personal. And the whole idea? Genius. Hats off to the people behind this. They've made sharing my story not just easy, but really special.

testimonial8.name: Carlos Martinez,
testimonial8.details: I was worried it would take forever, but I finished in just 2 months without hurrying. Adding photos was simple, and they turned out even better in print. P.S. The paper in the printed version feels really good. Thanks!

testimonial9.name: Rachel Nguyen,
testimonial9.details: First time writing and this was fun! Most of the questions felt adequate and provoked some nice memories, glad that I could pen them down before I forget them. Hardcover book looks professional!

question1.qs: What is included in each plan?
question1.ans: Full year of access to our platform, full-color hardcover printed book and free delivery.

question2.qs: Can I gift a LifeScript and how does that work?
question2.ans: Absolutely, gifting a plan is an easy, thoughtful and one of the best last-minute presents. You simply provide the email of the fortunate recipient and choose the date when you’d like the gift card to be sent. Once your purchase is complete, you’ll receive a confirmation email with a link to print out a beautiful gift card. You have the flexibility to email it right away, schedule a time when you want us to send it or print it out for a more personal touch.

question3.qs: Is Lifescript available in other languages?
question3.ans: Yes, it is also available in Spanish, and we are excited to expand to more languages soon. We believe that everyones deserves to have their story told regardless of their language.

question4.ans: Yes, we encourage adding as many photos as you like. You don’t have to worry about photo quality as we automatically upscale and fit your photos within printing requirements!

question5.ans: Yes, additional full-color hardcover books are available for 39$ each during or after your subscription period.

question6.ans: Your book, your pace! Some people finish their book in 2-3 sittings while others prefer to enjoy the process and continually polish their answers for months. However you choose, enjoy revisiting your unique memories!

question7.ans: If you are not entirely satisfied with your Lifescript experience, we offer an easy, no-questions-asked refund within 30 days of purchase, as long as no books have been printed. Your happiness is our highest priority.

question8.qs: Do you have any tutorials or instructions on how to use the platform and create my book?
question8.ans: Absolutely! We offer comprehensive video tutorials that provide step-by-step instructions on how to use the platform, create, edit, and order your book. Additionally, our friendly support team is available via chat and email to assist with any questions you may have.

reminderSection.title: Missed the moment? Set a
reminderSection.subTitle: reminder!
reminderSection.description: Complete the form, and we'll send you a reminder as your loved one's special day approaches.

footerSection.title: Echoes of the past, blueprint for the future.

headerSection.title: Features That Make Your Storytelling Experience Fun and
headerSection.subTitle: Easy

Section1.heading: Narrative Fusion
Section1.details: Eliminates the need to write complex texts. Simply answer as many questions as you like and fuse these answers into a cohesive, captivating and chronologically-organized chapter with a single click.

Section2.heading: Assisted Editing
Section2.details: Automatically edits and proofreads your text with real-time suggestions. From grammatical errors to sentence structure, it ensures a polished and professional narrative, saving you time and effort in the editing process.

Section3.heading: Voice-to-Text
Section3.details: Captures your spoken words, transforming them into written text. Ideal for the storyteller on the move, those who prefer speaking to typing, or anyone who loves to tell their tales out loud. Just press to start, speak your heart, and click to finish. It's that simple.

Section4.heading: Family Tree
Section4.details: Visually represents your ancestry at the end of your book. You simply add picture, name and age for the family members you wish to include. With family tree, you provide a rich personal and historical context to your story.

Section5.heading: Formatting Features
Section5.details: Allows you to customise your text and its font, style, size, color, layout and more. This empowers you to create a book as unique and beautiful as your own story.

Section6.heading: Auto Photo Improvement
Section6.details: Automatically adjusts your photos for high-quality printing by managing size, resolution, and aspect ratio. This eliminates manual editing, saving you time and effort in meeting printing requirements.

blogSection.subTitle: Tips

aboutSection.title: Empowering people to create a timeless legacy, resonating across
aboutSection.subTitle: generations

ourMission.title: Our
ourMission.subtitle: Mission
ourMission.description: There is this notion that to have your own autobiography book, you need to be either rich or famous. But we believe that every life is special and deserves to be remembered. That is why we have created an easy-to-use, affordable platform to help people preserve their memories, rediscover their roots, and create a deeper connection with themselves and their families.

ourStory.title: Our Story...
ourStory.description: A couple of years ago, our founder, Angel, accidentally found a dusty, forgotten book that turned out to be a portal to the past. It was written by his great grandfather who passed away shortly after Angel was born, and chronicled his personal experiences and memories from the harsh 20th century communist regime in his home country - Bulgaria. After reading the book, Angel felt a deep connection to his great grandfather, as if they had known each other well, despite never having met.
ourStory.discription1: This experience sparked a realization that personal stories have the power to inspire us, to heal us, and to bring us together across time and space.
ourStory.discription2: Embracing this insight, Angel took on a journey to make autobiography book creation not just as a service, but as a mission to keep our joys, our struggles and our stories alive. That journey is what we now call Lifescript.

valueData1.title: Empowerment & Accessibility:
valueData1.detail: We empower individuals with an accessible platform for capturing and celebrating unique life stories, designed for all ages and abilities.

valueData2.title: Family Legacy:
valueData2.detail: We empower intergenerational connections through sharing and safeguarding personal stories, fostering a deeper family identity and sense of belonging.

valueData3.title: Personal Growth:
valueData3.detail: We champion self-discovery, self-reflection, and personal evolution that comes from revisiting and sharing life's moments.

valueData4.title: Inspiration:
valueData4.detail: Personal stories are wellsprings of motivation, lessons, wisdom, and encouragement for others to navigate their own paths in life.

valueData5.title: Empathy & Insight:
valueData5.detail: Our journey into personal stories cultivates profound empathy and a richer human experience.

valueData6.title: Inclusivity & Diversity:
valueData6.detail: Our platform honors and preserves the diversity of all life stories, ensuring each narrative is valued and celebrated.

pointsArray1.title: Autobiography, Not Just Q&A
pointsArray1.description: Lifescript enables users to craft a book with chapters, reflecting their lives with depth and professionalism, all while keeping it simple and engaging.

pointsArray2.title: Ease of Use and Support
pointsArray2.description: Our platform is user-friendly and comes with comprehensive support like FAQs, instructional videos, and live chat. Our users spend less time proofreading and editing, zero time configuring photos, and plenty of time on the voice-to-text feature when they don't feel like typing.

pointsArray3.title: Understanding Ancestry
pointsArray3.description: If we know who we came from, we may better understand who we are. Lifescript helps users build their family tree with photos, names, and birthplaces, making it easy to see the connections between the different generations.

faqsSections.title: FAQs
faqsSections.description: Want to know more about Lifescript? Here, you’ll find answers to the questions we get asked the most about.

question1.question: Can I purchase extra books?
question1.answer: Yes, additional full-color hardcover books are available for 39$ each.

question2.question: How long will it take?
question2.answer: Your book, your pace! Some people finish their book in 2-3 sittings while others prefer to enjoy the process and continually polish their answers for months. However you choose, enjoy revisiting your unique memories!

question3.question: Can I gift LifeScript and how does that work?
question3.answer: Absolutely, gifting LifeScript is an easy, thoughtful and one of the best last-minute presents. You simply provide the email of the fortunate recipient and choose the date when you’d like the gift card to be sent. Once your purchase is complete, you’ll receive a confirmation email with a link to print out a beautiful gift card. You have the flexibility to email it right away, schedule a time when you want us to send it or print it out for a more personal touch.

question4.question: What is included in each plan?
question4.answer: Lifetime access to our platform, full-color hardcover printed book and free delivery.

question5.question: Is international shipping available and how much does it cost?
question5.answer: We ship internationally and provide delivery tracking. Oh, and it’s free.

question6.question: Is Lifescript available in other languages?
question6.answer: Yes, it is also available in Spanish, and we are excited to expand to more languages soon. We believe that everyones deserves to have their story told regardless of their language.

question7.question: What is your refund policy?
question7.answer: If you are not entirely satisfied with your Lifescript experience, we offer an easy, no-questions-asked refund within 30 days of purchase, as long as no books have been printed. Your happiness is our highest priority.

question8.question: What customization options are available for my book?
question8.answer: The exterior consists of durable, premium A5 size cover (148mm x 210mm or 5.83in x 8.27in) with professional, customizable designs. On the inside, enjoy premium 80p paper and tailor the text to your preference - font, size, bold, italics, underline and more.

question9.question: Can I add photos?
question9.answer: Yes, we encourage adding as many photos as you like. You don’t have to worry about photo quality as we automatically upscale and fit your photos within printing requirements!

question10.question: How can I ensure my book and information remain private?
question10.answer: Your privacy is our top priority. We use the latest security technologies to protect your personal stories and information.

question11.question: Do you have any tutorials or instructions on how to use the platform and create my book?
question11.answer: Absolutely! We offer comprehensive video tutorials that provide step-by-step instructions on how to use the platform, create, edit, and order your book. Additionally, our friendly support team is available via chat and email to assist with any questions you may have.

question12.question: Is there a word or page limit to my stories?
question12.answer: There is a 600 page limit but in practice books are around 100-150 pages.

question13.question: Can I specify when the gift email is sent to my recipient?
question13.answer: You will be able to choose the date that the gift email is sent when you purchase the gift plan. Gift emails are sent in the early morning on the chosen date.

question14.question: Can I add or edit questions?
question14.answer: You can do both whenever you want until you order the physical book.

question15.question: How long does book delivery take?

question16.question: Can I customize the frequency of questions I receive?
question16.answer: Yes, you have full control over how often you receive questions.
